00028 int main()
00029 {
00030     // create knowledge
00031     JMA_Knowledge* knowledge = new JMA_Knowledge;
00032 
00033     cout<<"Test the System and User Dictionaries. "<<endl;
00034     // set dictionary files
00035     const char* sysdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT;
00036     const char* userdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_USER_DICT_CSV;
00037     cout << "system dictionary: " << sysdict << endl;
00038     cout << "user dictionary: " << userdict << endl;
00039 
00040     // load dictioanry files
00041     knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00042     knowledge->addUserDict(userdict);
00043     int result = knowledge->loadDict();
00044     if(result == 0)
00045     {
00046         cerr << "fail to load dictionary files" << endl;
00047         exit(1);
00048     }
00049 
00050     // create tagger, which life cycle is managed by the caller.
00051     MeCab::Tagger* tagger = knowledge->createTagger();
00052     assert(tagger && "MeCab::Tagger is accessible after dictionary is loaded");
00053 
00054     // just for test: get dictionary info
00055     cout << endl << "dictionary infos:" << endl;
00056     for (const MeCab::DictionaryInfo *d = tagger->dictionary_info(); d; d = d->next) {
00057         cout << "filename:\t" << d->filename << endl;
00058         cout << "version:\t" << d->version << endl;
00059         cout << "charset:\t" << d->charset << endl;
00060         cout << "type:\t" << d->type   << endl;
00061         cout << "size:\t" << d->size << endl;
00062         cout << "left size:\t" << d->lsize << endl;
00063         cout << "right size:\t" << d->rsize << endl;
00064         cout << endl;
00065     }
00066 
00067     // destroy tagger
00068     delete tagger;
00069 
00070     cout<<"\n#Test the Sentence Separator "<<endl;
00071     const char* senConfig = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SENTENCE_CONFIG;
00072     knowledge->loadSentenceSeparatorConfig(senConfig);
00073     // comment the line below as "." is removed from "../db/config/sen-eucjp.config"
00074     //assert( knowledge->isSentenceSeparator(".") );
00075     assert( knowledge->isSentenceSeparator("!") );
00076     assert( !knowledge->isSentenceSeparator("=") );
00077     assert( knowledge->isSentenceSeparator("。") );
00078     assert( !knowledge->isSentenceSeparator("、") );
00079     assert( !knowledge->isSentenceSeparator("の") );
00080 
00081 
00082     cout<<"\n#Test the Stop Words Dictionary "<<endl;
00083     const char* stopWordDic = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_STOPWORD_DICT;
00084     knowledge->loadStopWordDict(stopWordDic);
00085     assert( knowledge->isStopWord("教師") );
00086     assert( !knowledge->isStopWord("胸元") );
00087     assert( knowledge->isStopWord("年生") );
00088     assert( !knowledge->isStopWord("年1生") );
00089     assert( knowledge->isStopWord("し") );
00090     assert( knowledge->isStopWord("は") );
00091     assert( !knowledge->isStopWord("はし") );
00092 
00093     delete knowledge;
00094 
00095     cout<<"\n#All tests are done!"<<endl;
